HeroSection.heading: Discover the perfect wine for you
HeroSection.sub_heading1: Join Vineo, match with wines that fit your tastes thanks to our personalized recommendations
HeroSection.sub_heading2: Surprise yourself with new flavors and unforgettable experiences

ElProceso.title: The Process
ElProceso.sub_title: How do we find the perfect wines for you?
ElProceso.desc1: We analyze your wine preferences through 18 key aspects
ElProceso.desc2: Our algorithm then determines the probability that you will like each bottle that we will include in each box.
ElProceso.desc3: This value is used to carefully select the bottles of wine that we will include in your box.
